titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at White-Hall before the King and Queen on the 29th of April, 1691, being the fast-day by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gilbert Lord Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Half title: The Bishop of Sarum's fast-sermon before the King and Queen, April 29, 1691.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
